fullText:
Warrior of the Wild [Multiclass Ranger]

Prerequisite: Str 13 or Dex 13
Benefit: You gain training in one skill from the ranger’s class skill list.
    Once per encounter, you can use the ranger's Hunter's Quarry class feature. The target you designate as your quarry remains your quarry until the end of your next turn.


Addition (6/10/2008)
Add the following sentence to the end of the second paragraph of the benefit section: “The target you designate as your quarry remains your quarry until the end of your next turn.”

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 208.
name: Warrior of the Wild
benefit: You gain training in one skill from the ranger’s class skill list.
